= {company-name} and partner plugins

// [IMPORTANT]
// ====
// {company-name} core plugins are fully supported by {company-name} with support issues being directed to customer support in the first instance and then the {product-very-short} engineering team responsible for them where further support is required. 

// Partner plugins are *not* supported by Red Hat directly but they are supported by the Red Hat partner who created them as part of the customer's relationship with that partner.
// ====

//{company-name} and its partners support the following 15 plugins:

{product-very-short} core plugins contain functionality that is fundamental to {product}.

{company-name} provides full support for the following 15 core plugins.
